containerDefinitions.name: db-fix
command: apk add --no-cache python3 py3-pip && pip3 install psycopg2-binary && python3 -c "import psycopg2, os, urllib.parse as up; url = up.urlparse(os.environ['PGPASSWORD']); conn = psycopg2.connect(host=url.hostname, port=url.port, user=url.username, password=url.password, database=url.path[1:]); cur = conn.cursor(); print('Checking database...'); cur.execute('SELECT version_num FROM alembic_version ORDER BY version_num'); print('Current versions:', cur.fetchall()); cur.execute(\"INSERT INTO alembic_version (version_num) VALUES ('499278ad9251') ON CONFLICT (version_num) DO NOTHING\"); conn.commit(); print('Migration 499278ad9251 inserted successfully'); conn.close()"
